text: Select a neuron or gene to visualise network: select more than 1 to see the combination of networks
Select the subset of features you want to see
Use sliders to select the desired thresholds for network visualisation
Refresh to see the updated network

Interact with the network and try different layouts to visualise: click to highlight selected node, long click to add more nodes to selection, navigate the network using the zoom [+, -] and the arrows
